    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static VunglePub getInstance()

      • addEventListeners

        public void addEventListeners(VungleAdEventListener... eventListeners)

        Registers the input VungleAdEventListeners if they have not already been registered. If an input VungleAdEventListener equals a previously registered VungleAdEventListener, it will not be registered a second time.

        N.B. This method has the potential to leak memory if you register a new VungleAdEventListener on every call to Activity.onCreate(). Therefore, you should do one of the following:

        • call clearEventListeners() or removeEventListeners(VungleAdEventListener...) in Activity.onDestroy()
        • call clearAndSetEventListeners(VungleAdEventListener...) instead of addEventListeners() in Activity.onCreate().
        Overrides:
        addEventListeners in class com.vungle.publisher.VunglePubBase
        Parameters:
        eventListeners - the VungleAdEventListeners to add
        See Also:
        clearEventListeners(), removeEventListeners(VungleAdEventListener...), clearAndSetEventListeners(VungleAdEventListener...)

      • clearEventListeners

        public void clearEventListeners()
        Removes all VungleAdEventListeners.
        Overrides:
        clearEventListeners in class com.vungle.publisher.VunglePubBase

      • clearAndSetEventListeners

        public void clearAndSetEventListeners(VungleAdEventListener... eventListeners)
        Clears registered VungleAdEventListeners and then adds the input eventListeners.
        Overrides:
        clearAndSetEventListeners in class com.vungle.publisher.VunglePubBase
        Parameters:
        eventListeners - the VungleAdEventListeners to register

      • removeEventListeners

        public void removeEventListeners(VungleAdEventListener... eventListeners)

        Overrides:
        removeEventListeners in class com.vungle.publisher.VunglePubBase
        Parameters:

      • init

        public void init(Context context,
                 java.lang.String vungleAppId,
                 java.lang.String[] placementReferenceIds,
                 VungleInitListener initListener)
        Initializes the Vungle Publisher SDK. You must call this method before calling playAd(String, AdConfig).
        Overrides:
        init in class com.vungle.publisher.VunglePubBase
        Parameters:
        context - the Android application context
        vungleAppId - your app's Vungle ID as shown on the Vungle Dashboard
        placementReferenceIds - list of placements the current version of host app is interested in
        initListener - initialization event listener

      • getGlobalAdConfig

        public AdConfig getGlobalAdConfig()
        Get the current global ad configuration - to be called after init(Context, String, String[], VungleInitListener).
        Overrides:
        getGlobalAdConfig in class com.vungle.publisher.VunglePubBase
        Returns:
        global ad configuration, which could be null before SDK initialization

      • isInitialized

        public boolean isInitialized()
        Check if the SDK is initialized.
        Overrides:
        isInitialized in class com.vungle.publisher.VunglePubBase
        Returns:
        true if the SDK is successfully initialized.

      • isAdPlayable

        public boolean isAdPlayable(java.lang.String placementReferenceId)

        Overrides:

        Parameters:

      • playAd

        public void playAd(java.lang.String placementReferenceId,
                   AdConfig adConfig)
        Request to play an ad for the given placement with an optional AdConfig - to be called only after receiving VungleAdEventListener.onAdAvailabilityUpdate(String, boolean) callback or after isAdPlayable(String) returns true for the placement.
        Overrides:
        playAd in class com.vungle.publisher.VunglePubBase
        Parameters:
        placementReferenceId - a valid placement reference identifier
        adConfig - additional override-ad-configuration for playing the ad
